auth_manageWorkspaces: Manage workspaces, automate workflows, and operate Active Table data with E2EE security.
auth_manageStructuredData: Manage structured data with flexible schemas
auth_orCreateNewWorkspace: Or create a new workspace after login
auth_needNewAccount: Need a new account? Contact admin or create one.
workspace_dashboard_error: Unable to load data. Please try again.
workspace_dashboard_noWorkspacesSubtitle: Create your first workspace to start digitizing your work processes.
workspace_dashboard_createNewDescription: Set up your workspace name, namespace, and description. You can configure teams, roles, and Modules after creation.
workspace_dashboard_errorRetry: An error occurred while connecting to the service. Please try refreshing the page.
workspace_empty_description: Create your first workspace to start digitizing your work processes.
workspace_form_namespaceHelp: Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only
activeTables_page_subtitle: Manage modules and encrypted data tables across your workspace groups.
activeTables_page_errorGeneric: Unable to load modules. Please try again.
activeTables_empty_description: Modules help your teams manage structured data securely. Create a new module to get started.
activeTables_detail_notFoundDescription: We couldn't locate that module in the selected workspace.
activeTables_detail_encryptionDescriptio: Modules enforce encryption for sensitive columns and respect workspace key management policies.
activeTables_detail_encryptionKeyManagem: Encryption keys follow the table configuration (E2EE vs server-managed).
activeTables_detail_encryptionAccess: Users require proper permissions before decrypting protected values.
activeTables_records_viewerDescription: Preview decrypted values once table keys are available. Filtering and exporting will arrive in the next iteration.
activeTables_records_errorGeneric: Unable to load records. Please try again.
activeTables_records_invalidContext: Workspace or table context is missing. Open this page from the Modules list.
activeTables_records_emptyState: No records available on this page yet.
encryption_keyManagementDescription: Manage your encryption keys and security settings for end-to-end encrypted data.
encryption_initializeDescription: Set up end-to-end encryption for your workspace. This will create a master password that protects all your encryption keys.
encryption_passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
encryption_exportKeysDescription: Download your encryption keys for backup. Keep them in a secure location.
encryption_importKeysDescription: Restore your encryption keys from a backup file.
encryption_dangerZoneDescription: These actions cannot be undone. Please be careful.
encryption_clearAllDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all encryption data? This action cannot be undone.
activity_noRecentItemsDescription: Start exploring your workspace to see activity here.
notifications_description: You will find shared updates, workflow alerts, and review requests right here once the live event stream lands.
search_description: Search across tables, records, and workflows from a single surface. The command palette and filters are in development.
help_description: Browse guides, contact support, and review status updates. The help center is launching alongside the new navigation IA.
workspace_workflow_description: Design workflows, orchestrate automations, and track progress in real time. This module is being wired to the new sidebar experience.
workspace_team_description: Invite collaborators, review roles, and manage permissions for every workspace member. The dedicated experience is on its way.
workspace_roles_description: Define granular access, create custom roles, and audit user capabilities in one place. We are finalizing the data layer behind this view.
workspace_analytics_description: Monitor usage trends, automation throughput, and team health with interactive dashboards. Visual reports will appear here shortly.
workspace_starred_description: Keep your most important tables, workflows, and dashboards a click away. Pinning is being added alongside the redesigned sidebar.
workspace_activity_description: Review workspace changes, approvals, and audit logs in one timeline. The activity feed is being connected to live events.
workspace_archived_description: Restore tables, workflows, and forms that are no longer active. We are wiring retention policies and restore actions right now.
activeTables_comments_deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
activeTables_comments_empty: No comments yet. Be the first to start the discussion.
activeTables_comments_hint: Select a record to view the comment thread here.
activeTables_kanban_noConfig: No Kanban configuration found for this table.
activeTables_kanban_statusMissing: Kanban status field is not configured.
activeTables_kanban_emptyColumn: No records in this column yet.
activeTables_permissions_description: Adjust comment permissions by team and role.
activeTables_permissions_noTeams: No teams or roles available yet.
activeTables_permissions_option_related_: Records related to any team member
activeTables_permissions_option_created_: Records created or assigned to team members
Records created or related to team members
modules_tooltip: Manage structured data with customizable tables and automation
modules_page_helpText: Modules allow you to create and manage custom data tables for HRM, CRM, Finance, and other business processes.
modules_dialog_createDescription: Set up a new module to manage structured data with workflows, encryption, and team collaboration.
modules_dialog_editDescription: Update your module configuration, fields, and security settings. Changes will affect all existing records.
tableType_blank_description: Set up a custom table with your own fields
tableType_taskEisenhower_description: Organize and prioritize tasks using the Eisenhower Matrix to focus on the most important work.
tableType_contract_description: Manage the entire contract lifecycle from creation, tracking, renewal to archiving.
tableType_hairSalonCustomer_description: Manage customer information, service history, and related details for hair salon clients.
tableType_prototype_description: Store, organize, and track the entire prototyping process from initial sketches to testing and refinement.
tableType_insightTTM_description: Collect, analyze, and manage Marketing Insights across the Customer Journey based on the TTM model (Truth, Tension, Motivation) for strategic action.
tableType_contentScript_description: Create, manage, and optimize digital content scripts for multiple platforms, ensuring communication effectiveness and consistency.
tableType_swot_description: Analyze and evaluate project, business, or personal situations using the SWOT model (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats).
tableType_scamper_description: Manage creative ideas using the SCAMPER technique.
tableType_herzberg_description: Manage and evaluate Hygiene factors and Motivators according to Herzberg's Two-Factor Theory.
tableType_onboarding_description: Manage employee onboarding process combining 4C, First 90 Days, and Buddy System to track integration and development of new hires.
tableType_customerPipeline_description: Manage customers through sales pipeline stages, measure conversion rates, and compare performance across team members.
tableType_vendor_description: Manage, track, and evaluate suppliers of goods/services, supporting contract and supply quality management.
tableType_asset_description: Manage the complete asset lifecycle: from procurement, usage, maintenance, depreciation to disposal.
tableType_training_description: Manage training and development programs for employees in the organization.
tableType_learningProgress_description: Track participation, progress, and training results of employees in training programs.
tableType_culture_description: Manage and track internal culture activities to enhance team bonding and work spirit.
tableType_cultureRegistration_descriptio: Manage registrations for internal culture activities and events.
tableType_taxDeduction_description: Manage tax deduction policies for employees.
tableType_workProcess_description: Manage employees' work history within the organization
tableType_jobTitle_description: Manage job titles within departments of the organization
tableType_employeeProfile_description: Manage employee profiles in the organization
tableType_benefitManagement_description: Manage internal benefits programs including healthcare, financial support, travel, culture, and other employee perks.
tableType_benefitParticipant_description: Manage information of participants in internal benefits programs, including participant details, program enrollment, benefits, and participation status.
tableType_approval_description: Manage approval requests in the organization: requester, approver, status, history, and links to related objects.
tableType_leavePolicy_description: Manage employee leave policies, including number of days off, leave types, eligibility conditions, and related policies.
tableType_insurance_description: Manage insurance policies applicable to employees, contribution rates, and benefits.
tableType_reward_description: Manage employee reward policies, including reward types and values.
tableType_penalty_description: Manage penalties applicable to employees, including penalty amounts and related regulations.
tableType_salaryPolicy_description: Manage salary policy, allowances, bonuses, and regulations applicable to employees.
tableType_salarySetup_description: Manage salary configuration, including salary rates, allowances, insurance, and applicable policies.
settings_general_tableIdHelp: Unique identifier for this table. Use this when referencing the table in APIs.
settings_general_tableLimitHelp: Maximum number of records allowed in this table (1-1000)
settings_general_defaultSortHelp: Default sort order when displaying records in list view
settings_general_encryptionE2EE: End-to-End Encryption (E2EE) - Key stored locally on your device
settings_general_encryptionServer: Server-Side Encryption - Key managed by server
settings_general_encryptionWarningE2EE: You are using End-to-End Encryption (E2EE). The encryption key is stored ONLY on your device. If you lose this key, your data will be permanently lost and cannot be recovered. Please backup your encryption key securely.
settings_general_encryptionWarningServer: The encryption key is managed by the server. Data is encrypted at rest and in transit, but the server administrator has access to decrypt your data. For maximum privacy, consider enabling E2EE mode.
settings_general_encryptionHelpEditing: Enter a 32-character encryption key. Changes will be saved automatically when you reach 32 characters.
settings_general_encryptionHelpViewing: Click the edit button to modify the encryption key. The key must be exactly 32 characters long.
settings_general_searchableFieldsHelp: Selected fields will be hashed and indexed for fast searching. Only text-based fields (Short Text, Text, Rich Text, Email, URL) can be made searchable.
settings_save_successDescription: Your table configuration has been updated successfully.
settings_save_errorDescription: Failed to save table configuration. Please try again.
settings_unsaved_description: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
settings_listView_description: Configure how records are displayed in the list view
settings_listView_genericTableBadgeDescr: Each record is a row, each field is a column
settings_listView_layoutGenericTableHelp: Standard table view with columns for each field
settings_listView_layoutHeadColumnHelp: Compact card-style view suitable for mobile or tight spaces
settings_listView_displayFieldsHelp: Selected fields will appear as columns in the list view (order matters)
settings_listView_titleFieldHelp: Main field displayed prominently (bold, large text)
settings_listView_subLineFieldsHelp: Fields displayed below the title in smaller text
settings_listView_tailFieldsHelp: Fields displayed at the end of each row (status, date, etc.)
settings_listView_previewDescription: Changes will be applied immediately when you save the settings. The list view will reflect your configuration.
settings_detailView_description: Configure how individual record details are displayed
settings_detailView_layoutHeadDetailHelp: Vertical layout suitable for narrow screens
settings_detailView_layoutTwoColumnHelp: Two-column layout optimized for wide screens
settings_detailView_commentsRightPanelHe: Display comments in a separate column on the right
settings_detailView_titleFieldHelp: Main field displayed at the top (prominent, large text)
settings_detailView_subLineFieldsHelp: Fields displayed below the title in the header
settings_detailView_headTitleFieldHelp: Field displayed as the main title
settings_detailView_rowTailFieldsHelp: Fields displayed in the body section vertically
settings_detailView_twoColumnBodyDescrip: Fields split into left and right columns
settings_detailView_leftColumnFieldsHelp: Fields displayed in the left column
settings_detailView_rightColumnFieldsHel: Fields displayed in the right column
settings_detailView_column1FieldsHelp: Fields displayed in the left column
settings_detailView_column2FieldsHelp: Fields displayed in the right column
settings_detailView_previewDescription: Changes will be applied immediately when you save the settings. The detail view will reflect your configuration.
settings_quickFilters_description: Create quick filters for common queries displayed at the top of the list view
settings_quickFilters_deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this quick filter?
settings_quickFilters_emptyWithFields: Click "Add Quick Filter" to create your first filter.
settings_quickFilters_emptyNoFields: Add choice-based fields (SELECT, CHECKBOX, REFERENCE) to enable quick filters.
settings_quickFilters_infoDescription: Only choice-based fields (SELECT, CHECKBOX, REFERENCE) can be used as quick filters. These filters will appear prominently at the top of the list view for easy access.
settings_quickFilters_dialogDescription: Select a field to use as a quick filter in the list view
settings_quickFilters_fieldHelp: Only eligible fields (SELECT, CHECKBOX, REFERENCE types) are shown
settings_dangerZone_description: Irreversible actions that permanently affect your table
settings_dangerZone_warningDescription: Actions in this section are irreversible and will permanently delete data. Please proceed with extreme caution.
settings_dangerZone_deleteDescription: Permanently delete this table and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
settings_dangerZone_deleteItem4: All automation workflows linked to this table
settings_dangerZone_beforeDeleteTip3: Notify team members who use this table
settings_dangerZone_confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. All data will be permanently deleted.
settings_dangerZone_confirmAboutTo: You are about to permanently delete:
settings_dangerZone_confirmFinalWarningT: This action is irreversible. All data, comments, and configurations will be permanently lost.
settings_kanban_description: Set up multiple Kanban board views for visualizing workflows
settings_kanban_deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Kanban screen?
settings_kanban_missingFieldsDescription: You need at least one single-choice field (SELECT_ONE, SELECT_ONE_RECORD, SELECT_ONE_WORKSPACE_USER) to create a Kanban board. These fields will be used as column categories.
settings_kanban_emptyWithFields: Click "Add Kanban Screen" to create your first board.
settings_kanban_emptyNoFields: Add single-choice fields to enable Kanban boards.
settings_kanban_feature1: Create multiple Kanban views for different workflows
settings_kanban_feature2: Each board uses a status field to organize cards into columns
settings_kanban_feature3: Drag-and-drop cards between columns to update status
settings_kanban_feature4: Customize which fields appear on each card
settings_gantt_description: Set up Gantt chart views for project planning and timeline visualization
settings_gantt_deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Gantt chart?
settings_gantt_missingFieldsDescription: You need at least two DATE or DATETIME fields (for start and end dates) to create a Gantt chart.
settings_gantt_emptyWithFields: Click "Add Gantt Chart" to create your first timeline view.
settings_gantt_emptyNoFields: Add DATE or DATETIME fields to enable Gantt charts.
settings_gantt_feature1: Visualize project timelines and task schedules
settings_gantt_feature2: Track task progress with progress bars
settings_gantt_feature3: Manage task dependencies with connecting lines
settings_gantt_feature4: Ideal for project planning and resource allocation
settings_permissions_description: Manage team and role-based permissions for actions
settings_permissions_noTeamsDescription: You need to create teams and roles in your workspace before configuring permissions.
settings_permissions_noRoles: No roles found for this team.
settings_permissions_matrixDescription: Configure permissions for each role and action. Different actions have different permission options based on their type.
settings_ganttModal_description: Configure a Gantt chart view for project planning and timeline visualization. Tasks will be displayed as horizontal bars on a timeline.
settings_ganttModal_descriptionPlacehold: Brief description of this Gantt chart...
settings_ganttModal_taskNameFieldHelp: Field used as the task name/label in the Gantt chart
settings_ganttModal_startDateFieldHelp: When the task starts (DATE or DATETIME field required)
settings_ganttModal_endDateFieldHelp: When the task ends (DATE or DATETIME field required)
settings_ganttModal_progressFieldHelp: Numeric field (0-100) to show task completion percentage
settings_ganttModal_dependencyFieldHelp: SELECT_LIST_RECORD field linking to other tasks this task depends on
settings_kanbanModal_description: Configure a Kanban board view for visualizing your workflow. Records will be organized into columns based on the status field.
settings_kanbanModal_descriptionPlacehol: Brief description of this Kanban view...
settings_kanbanModal_statusFieldHelp: This field's values will become columns in the Kanban board. Only single-choice fields are allowed.
settings_kanbanModal_headlineFieldHelp: This field will be prominently displayed as the card title in the Kanban board
settings_kanbanModal_displayFieldsPlaceh: Select fields to display on cards...
settings_kanbanModal_displayFieldsHelp: Additional fields to show on each Kanban card for quick reference
settings_fieldModal_descriptionAdd: Configure a new field for your table. Fields define the structure of your data.
settings_fieldModal_typeLockedInfo: Field type cannot be changed after creation to maintain data integrity.
settings_fieldModal_labelPlaceholder: e.g., Customer Name, Email Address, Order Date
settings_fieldModal_labelHelp: The display name shown to users
settings_fieldModal_nameHelp: Unique identifier (auto-generated from label, lowercase, snake_case)
settings_fieldModal_nameLockedHelp: Field name cannot be changed after creation
settings_fieldModal_placeholderHelp: Hint text shown in empty input fields
settings_fieldModal_defaultValueHelp: Initial value when creating new records
settings_fieldModal_requiredHelp: Users must provide a value for this field
settings_fieldModal_errorOptionsRequired: At least one option is required for selection fields
settings_fieldOptions_description: Define the choices available for this field. At least one option is required.
settings_fieldOptions_addPlaceholder: Type option name and press Enter...
settings_fieldModal_errorReferenceFieldR: Reference field is required for FIRST_REFERENCE_RECORD
settings_actions_description: Manage default system actions and create custom actions for specific workflows
settings_actions_customEmpty: No custom actions configured yet. Click "Add Custom Action" to create your first custom action.
settings_actions_deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this action? This action cannot be undone.
settings_actionModal_description: Create a custom action for your workflow. The action ID will be used to trigger business logic on the backend.
settings_actionModal_iconHelp: Select an icon from Material Icons library
settings_actionModal_actionIdHelp: This ID is used to identify the action in API calls and backend logic

team_form_description_placeholder: Describe the team's purpose and responsibilities
team_form_description_too_long: Description must be less than 500 characters
team_create_description: Create a new team to organize workspace members
team_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete "{teamName}"? This action cannot be undone. All roles and member assignments for this team will be removed.

role_empty_description: Create roles to define permissions and responsibilities for team members.

role_form_description_too_long: Description must be less than 500 characters
role_create_description: Create a new role to assign to team members
role_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete "{roleName}"? This will remove this role from all team members.

member_form_user_new: New user - will create new account

member_empty_workspace_description: Add members to your workspace to start collaborating.
member_empty_team_title: This team has no members yet
member_empty_team_description: Add members to this team to assign work.
